backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing content CRUD, user/admin access control, and storage for videos, events, gallery items, releases, tracks, artist profile, and user plans.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short humanâ€‘written summaries for key frontend files and components across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app router setup with all routes, global providers, and layout integration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: UI screen shown when a user is unauthenticated, explaining admin Principal-based login and providing an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Gall: Admin CRUD interface for gallery items with image upload, edit/delete actions, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Plan: UI for creating, editing, and deleting user subscription plans using dialogs and admin mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Prof: Fetches and edits an artist profile, allowing updates to name, bio, and social links.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Rele: Manages music releases and associated tracks, with support for file uploads, editing, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Show: Creates and updates event listings including date, venue, city, and ticket link.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Vide: Handles adding, editing, and deleting video entries with titles and platform links.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and a dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper with navigation, footer, and conditional profile setup dialog based on user identity and profile state.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteNav.t: Responsive navigation bar that shows links, login button, and an admin link when applicable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMutations.ts: React Query mutation hooks for admin actions like editing profiles, releases, tracks, and other content using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login/logout flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching profiles, media, events, gallery items, admin status, and user plans via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard that checks authentication and admin status, handles profile setup, and displays tabs for managing site content.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a grid of gallery images with captions and a modal viewer, showing skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero section, artist profile data, social links, and an about section using fetched profile info.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Plan selection page that requires login, loads available user plans, shows current plan, and allows assigning a new plan.
frontend/src/pages/ReleasesPage.tsx: Shows music releases with cover art, release dates, tracklists, and streaming links, with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/ShowsPage.tsx: Displays upcoming events sorted by date with venue details and ticket links, with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Renders a list of videos with titles and external watch links, with skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/utils/platformLinks.tsx: Provides getPlatformInfo to detect platform names from URLs and return matching labels and icon components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and persisting or clearing them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the music artist website.
